id.name: id
id.desc: The education service identifier - This identifier is based on national identification codes, if it exists.

name.name: name
name.desc: The name of the education institution

site.name: site_name
site.desc: The name of the specific site or branch of a healthcare institution

geo_qual.name: geo_qual
geo_qual.desc: A quality indicator for the geolocation - 1: Good, 2: Medium, 3: Low, -1: Unknown

city.name: city
city.desc: City name (sometimes refers to a region or a municipality)

students.name: cap_students
students.desc: Measure of capacity by maximum number of students

enrolled.name: cap_students_enrolled
enrolled.desc: Measure of capacity by number of enrolled students

level.name: level
level.desc: Education level, following the International Standard Classification of Education (ISCED 2011) classification.

fields.name: fields
fields.desc: Field of education and training, following the ISCED-F 2013 classification

url.name: url
url.desc: URL link to the institution's website

refdate.name: ref_date
refdate.desc: The reference date (DD/MM/YYYY) the data refers to. The dataset represents the reality as it was at this date.

pubdate.name: pub_date
pubdate.desc: The publication date of the dataset by Eurostat (DD/MM/YYYY). This should be used to track when this Eurostat dataset has changed.
